POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: thpc.tencentcloudapi.com

<公共请求参数>

    },
    "Placement": {
        "Zone": "ap-guangzhou-2"

    "ClusterId": "hpc-52nkfau6",
    "ImageId": "img-3la7wgnt",
    "InstanceChargeType": "SPOTPAID",
    "InstanceType": "S2.SMALL2",
    "NodeRole": "Compute",
    "QueueName": "compute"
}
